Player History
Drove in 6 runs against Ashburn on 9/12/1982...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Ashburn on 9/19/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1983, hitting .423 with 1 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1983, hitting .400 with 2 HR, 22 RBI...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/4/1986 to a 5-year deal worth $5,460,600 per year...
Injured on 8/27/1986 with a Inflamed Tricep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1987, hitting .440 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
